title: Candles cause blindness
content: I want to warn everyone that uses candles. I tried to blow out my candle one night and the force of my breath caused the wax to fly in my eye. NEVER AGAIN. Do yourself a favor and just use a fan to blow out your candles from now on.

title: Book suggestions?
content: Any book suggestions? I have been consumed by teachnolgy and social media lately. I feel like reading a book would help and any recommendations are appreciated.
